content: ज्योतिष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (षी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [ज्योतिः सूर्यादिगत्यादिकं प्रतिपाद्यतयाऽस्त्यस्य अच्] Astronomical or astrological. --षः An astronomer or astrologer. --षं {@--1@} Astronomy, astrology, the science of the course of the heavenly bodies and divisions of time resting thereon. {@--2@} One of the six Vedāṅgas (being a short tract on astronomy).
ज्योतिषी, ज्योतिष्कः A planet, star, luminary. --ष्कं <ab>N.</ab> of the shining peak of Meru. --ष्कः The चित्रक tree.
